subject: Economy
question_en: What was the gross domestic product (GDP) of India in 2020-21 in terms of billions of Indian Rupees?
question_hi: 2020-21 में भारत का ग्रॉस डॉलिटिक पॉडिटिक पाठ (GDP) हिंदी में बड़े रूप से बिलियों में?
explanation_en: The Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of India in 2020-21 was approximately Rs. 27,82,000 crore (in billions of Indian Rupees). This information can be obtained from various sources that provide economic data and statistics.

B_en: The Indian GDP in terms of billions of dollars for the fiscal year 2020-21 was Rs. 28,991.5 billion.

explanation_en: As per data available, the GDP of India in 2020-21 was Rs. 28,467 trillion.
